name: Stance Sloan 3 Pack Run Socks - Men's
description: When you find the ideal running sock, don't mess with a good thing. This durable 3 pack keeps you going day in and day out.Synthetic, cotton blend wicks moisture to keep feet cool and dry.Left/right engineered arch support delivers precise support.Feel 360® technology includes an anti-microbial silver ion treatment to eliminate odor causing bacteria.Infiknit™ construction adds durability to high-friction areas.
